personal.title: Back end Developer
personal.description: I craft beautiful, responsive web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences and writing clean, efficient code.
bio: Hello! I'm John, a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience building web applications. I specialize in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

I love solving complex problems and turning ideas into beautiful, functional websites. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or enjoying the great outdoors.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration. Features include user authentication, cart management, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard with interactive charts, real-time data visualization, and customizable reports for business insights.
